page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: Religion has a definite effect on industry in Clydebank.The major industries e.g.John Brown's shipyard and UIE Construction Works have {Industrial}Chaplains.Their job is to visit the factory and converse with individual workers and try to help with any problems they might have. {Church attendance}has dropped considerably in the past 10 years in the 30 churches in Clydebank.These churches organize many{activities for all age groups e.g. youth clubs,discos,Mens'and Womens'Guilds and Old Folks' clubs etc.Fund raising activities are held for various charities such as {Famine Relief in {Ethiopia}etc.A day centre is open for the less fortunate people who can go there for help.{Pope John Paul II}sent a 10 feet tall cross round the world to celebrate{International Youth Year
